channel.title: I need help with adding objects and npcs to my server:S
channel.description:
i need help with adding objects and npc's to my server..
can anyone help me? :|
do i have to do ::setobject or ::addnpc or someting like that?

item.title: I need help with adding objects and npcs to my server:S
item.dc:creator: @inferno_vann inferno vann
item.description:
@inferno_vann wrote:

For making objects...

Search in client.java

Code:

Public void newObject

Below that there will be a bunch of codes like this…

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with adding objects and npcs to my server:S

item.title: I need help with adding objects and npcs to my server:S
item.dc:creator: @0wn_3m_a1l 0wn 3m a1l
item.description:
@0wn_3m_a1l wrote:

[quote=“inferno vann, post:3, topic:241555”]For making objects…

Search

Public void newObject

Below that there will be a bunch of codes like this…

makeGlobalObject(3095, 3493, 2213, -3, 10); // bank booth makeGlobalObject(3095, 3494, 2213, -3, 10); // bank booth makeGlobalObject(3095, 3495, 2213, -3, 10); // bank booth makeGlobalObject(3095, 3496, 2213, -3, 10); // bank booth makeGlobalObject(3095, 3497, 2213, -3, 10); // bank booth

Below the last one, add this…

makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, -x, 10); // item name

xxxx = X coordinates

yyyy = Y coordinates

-x = Position the item is facing. 0 is north, -1 is east, -2 is south, -3 is west.

10 = Height level i think, just keep it at 10

item name = What ever the item name is your adding.

Hope I helped.[/quote]

oh yeah if ur helping someone please say where to search

Read full topic

@inferno_vann wrote:

For making objects…

Search

Public void newObject

Below that there will be a bunch of codes like this…

makeGlobalObject(3095, 3493, 2213, -3, 10); // bank booth makeGlobalObject(3095, 3494, 2213, -3, 10); // bank booth makeGlobalObject(3095, 3495, 2213, -3, 10); // bank booth makeGlobalObject(3095, 3496, 2213, -3, 10); // bank booth makeGlobalObject(3095, 3497, 2213, -3, 10); // bank booth

Below the last one, add this…

makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, -x, 10); // item name

xxxx = X coordinates

yyyy = Y coordinates

-x = Position the item is facing. 0 is north, -1 is east, -2 is south, -3 is west.

10 = Height level i think, just keep it at 10

item name = What ever the item name is your adding.

Hope I helped.

item.source: I need help with adding objects and npcs to my server:S

item.title: I need help with adding objects and npcs to my server:S
item.dc:creator: @0wn_3m_a1l 0wn 3m a1l
item.description:
@0wn_3m_a1l wrote:

Ok im busy but ill tell u how to do npc only.

ok first go on ur source and find in ur files autospawn.cfg

once do that u will see stuff like these:

spawn = 1615 2328 3170 0 0 0 0 0 2 abyssal demon
spawn = 2883 2331 3174 0 0 0 0 0 2 Dag Rex
spawn = 2882 2331 3168 0 0 0 0 0 2 dag prime

those are mine. but u copy one of these in ur autospawn.cfg (or (java).)

then in autospawn at bottom u see this:

[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]

Above that paste the thing u coppied.

then to change what npc and spot u want it lemme show u.

spawn = 1615 2328 3170 0 0 0 0 0 0 abyssal demon

this ^ ^ ^ ^ ^
npc id xcoords ycoords height level npc name

then save, compile, and run server.

hope that helped you!

Read full topic
